tierOne.name: World Theologin
tierOne.description: Identifies if anomaly has religious oragins

tierTwo.name: Knowlege if the occult
tierTwo.description: Reduce difficulty by 2 steps for intellect based action involving the occult.

tierThree.name: Unshaking faith
tierThree.description: You are immune to influence of religios artifacts.

tierFour.name: Power of faith
tierFour.description: over come your physical limits susceed at on might bases action or check

tierFive.name: Cult leaders charisma
tierFive.description: Convince one person of something no matter how strange.

tierSix.name: Amass a following
tierSix.description: Convince an NPC to follow you and do your bidding
